short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Draw any face easily using loomis method

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Drawing faces can be challenging, especially when aiming for specific details. Even small variations in measurements can drastically alter the appearance of a face.

This Chrome extension is designed to assist artists struggling with facial proportions. Built on the principles of the Loomis portrait method, it enables users to sketch faces with precision. Additionally, it empowers artists to depict any desired facial features accurately.

Over time, this tool aids artists in developing a keen instinct for facial nuances. By understanding the unique characteristics of each individual's face, artists can enhance their ability to capture likeness in their sketches.
